description: This request for standing offers (RFrSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number Doc3817235733 dated 2023-02-14 with a closing of 2023-03-22 at 2:00 PM. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide a three year Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply, delivery and off-loading of water treatment chemicals. The water treatment chemicals are as required on an as needed basis by the Department of National Defence, 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta and Canadian Forces Base Suffield, Ralston, Alberta from 2023-07-01 to 2026-06-30.
tags: Supply and Delivery of Water Treatment chemicals
